mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as recNum, +LVL, articleNO, parentNO, title, writedate, member_id, type, cnt from (select LEVEL as LVL, articleNO, parentNO, title, member_id, writeDate, type, cnt from t_board where type = 't' START WITH parentNO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentno ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC)) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
SELECT level, articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, member_id, cnt from t_board where type='f' START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO=parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_board(articleNO, parentNO,title,content, member_id, type) VALUES(#{articleNO},#{parentNO},#{title},#{content},#{member_id},#{type})
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in ( SELECT articleNO FROM t_board START WITH articleNO = #{articleNO} CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO )
